plugins.name: Fancy Figma to Bricks builder
plugins.description:
Forget doing things twice — design smarter by managing your variables, color palette and designs in Figma, then effortlessly transfer everything into Bricks builder with just a few clicks.


Plugin video: https://youtu.be/5_52ZX3yfGQ


Website: https://fancyframework.com/figma-plugin/


Purchase an early adopter license for 10 instances*: BUY NOW

Documentation: https://fancyframework.com/docs/

Facebook community: https://www.facebook.com/groups/fancybricks

YouTube: https://youtube.com/@fancybricks


* An instance refers to each individual installation of the software, whether on different devices or platforms. For example, if you activate the license on the desktop app and also use it on the web version, even with the same user account, it will count as two separate instances.


How it works?


Fancy Framework for Figma streamlines your workflow in three simple steps — from defining your design system in Figma to building real pages in Bricks. Here’s how:


Set up your design variables in Figma

Define your entire design system directly in Figma — colors, typography, spacing, and more. Group and name your variables for better clarity and consistency across your designs.


Export your variables and color palette to Bricks

With just a few clicks, convert your Figma variables into Bricks-compatible values. Keep your color system consistent across design and development — no need to manually recreate anything.


Copy from Figma, paste into Bricks

Select any Auto Layout section in Figma, copy it, and paste it directly into the Bricks editor. Supports autolayout, semantic tags, classes, grids and native Bricks elements — just like you designed it.


Main features

Fancy Figma to bricks builder plugin gives you everything you need to streamline your workflow: organize design variables, export color palettes, and paste fully structured sections directly into Bricks. No more duplicated effort — just clean, scalable, and efficient web design.


Advanced variable support

Use calc, rem, number and clamp() directly in your Figma variables for greater flexibility and control.


Auto-generate color variations

Generate transparent, darkened, and lightened versions of your colors instantly — no need to create them manually. Perfect for building accessible and consistent UI systems.


Export dynamic variables to Bricks

Thanks to support for clamp, calc, rem, and numeric operations, your Figma variables are ready for real-world usage inside Bricks — no tweaks needed.


Bricks-ready color palette export

Automatically export your color palette from Figma, linked directly to your variables — ready to import into Bricks and use seamlessly across your entire site.


Seamless copy-paste from Figma to Bricks

Copy any section built with Auto Layout in Figma and paste it directly into Bricks — layout structure, classes, and semantic tags all preserved.


Copy-Paste Features


Built for Auto Layout

By following best practices, your sections will copy perfectly into Bricks — layout, spacing, and hierarchy intact. Check out my free figma course: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLbc4J3wWyVcdnL9A_UA-WdE2tXRUW-I8O


Semantic HTML tag support

Your Figma sections can include semantic tags like [section], [container], [ul], [li], [h1–h6], [p], [span], and more. Perfect for SEO, accessibility, and clean markup.


Support for display grid

Display grid support uses (grid-x) (grid-x-x) to apply display: grid in Bricks automatically when pasting.


Class-friendly workflow

Use meaningful class names in Figma and watch them transfer seamlessly into Bricks. Combine with utility classes for maximum flexibility and control.


Bricks-native element compatibility

Paste sections that automatically map to Bricks' native elements like:

  1. Buttons
  2. Links
  3. SVG
  4. Forms
  5. Tabs
  6. Accordions
  7. Nav menu
  8. Logo
  9. Counters
  10. More will be added
plugins.tagline: The ultimate web design workflow for Bricks Builder

plugins.name: AutoFrame
plugins.description:
AutoFrame: Connect Airtable Data to Your Figma Designs


Bridge the gap between your data and your designs! Autoframe allows you to seamlessly connect your Airtable bases directly to Figma, automating the creation and synchronization of design elements.


Stop manually copying and pasting data. With Autoframe, you can generate perfectly structured Figma frames populated with real content from your Airtable views, saving you time and reducing errors.


Key Features:

  1. Secure Airtable Connection: Easily connect your Airtable account using a secure OAuth 2.0 flow.
  2. Automated Frame Generation: Select an Airtable Base, Table, and View, and instantly generate Figma frames for each record.
  3. Data-Driven Content: Choose specific Airtable fields to populate text layers within your frames, ensuring your designs reflect your actual data.
  4. Custom Frame Naming: Designate an Airtable field to automatically name your generated frames.
  5. Dynamic Frame Sizing: Optionally add a "Dimensions" field (e.g., 300x500) in your Airtable view to automatically set the width and height of corresponding Figma frames.
  6. Flexible Layout: Control the arrangement of generated frames by specifying the number of columns.
  7. Figma to Airtable: Push text edits or frame name changes made in Figma back to your Airtable base.
  8. Airtable to Figma: Pull the latest data from Airtable to update your existing generated frames without needing to regenerate everything.
  9. Secure Login: Protects access via an Email + One-Time Passcode (OTP) verification system.


How It Works:

  1. Connect: Log in and securely connect your Airtable account.
  2. Select: Choose your Airtable Base, Table, View, and the fields you want to use for frame names and content.
  3. Generate: Click "Generate Frames" to automatically create frames on your Figma canvas populated with your data.
  4. Sync: Use the "Sync Changes to Airtable" or "Sync From Airtable" buttons to keep your designs and data aligned.


Ideal For:

  1. Data-driven design workflows
  2. Managing dynamic content within designs (e.g., user profiles, product cards)
  3. Populating components for design systems
  4. Quickly visualizing data structures from Airtable
  5. Anyone looking to streamline their design process by integrating directly with Airtable.


Get started with AutoFrame today and bring your Airtable data to life in Figma!
plugins.tagline: Autoframe: The Bridge Between Airtable and Figma.

plugins.name: Sloth D2C 设计稿转代码
plugins.description:
Sloth D2C 设计稿转代码插件是一款面向前端开发和设计团队的智能化工具，支持将设计稿快速转化为可直接用于生产的HTML代码。也支持输入文本&图片等信息通过AI一键生成设计稿。

1、高质量还原：通过该插件对设计稿生成的代码，在样式布局上能够高度还原设计稿，减少了人工编码的工时，省去设计走查流程。

2、更贴近人工代码：生成的代码支持tailwindcss、autolayout/flex布局、合理的行列分组，循环节点提取，图床托管等功能。

3、人工编辑：生成的代码不够满意，支持在线人工二次编辑，如图片节点的重新编解组、源码修改、属性调整等。

4、 一键生成设计稿：根据输入文本&图片等信息，结合prompt工程，AI生成指定风格页面代码后，再进一步转换成figma节点。

  2. Find objects with specific child elements
  3. Save, load, and combine sets of selected elements
  4. Export and import selection sets to share between files and teams

Create beautiful, customizable QR codes directly in Figma with this powerful plugin. Perfect for designers, marketers, and developers who need to quickly generate and place QR codes in their designs.


Features

✨ Instant Generation

- Generate QR codes in seconds

- Support for URLs, text, and more

- Real-time preview


🎨 Full Customization

- Custom colors for both foreground and background

- Adjustable size and margin

- Multiple border styles (solid, dashed, none)

- Custom border width

- Dark/Light mode support


🖼️ Logo Integration

- Add your brand logo to QR codes

- Automatic logo sizing and positioning

- Maintain QR code readability


📱 Multiple Formats

- PNG and JPEG export options

- High-quality output

- Optimized for both print and digital


📋 History & Management

- Save your recent QR codes

- Quick access to previous designs

- Easy history management


Use Cases

- Marketing materials

- Business cards

- Product packaging

- Event tickets

- Digital menus

- Social media graphics

- Print materials

- Website designs


How to Use

1. Enter your text or URL

2. Customize the appearance

3. Add your logo (optional)

4. Generate the QR code

5. Place it directly in your design

6. Download or export as needed


Perfect For

- Designers creating marketing materials

- Marketers adding QR codes to campaigns

- Developers needing QR codes for apps

- Businesses creating branded QR codes

- Anyone who needs professional QR codes quickly


Note: This plugin requires an active internet connection to generate QR codes.
plugins.tagline: Create, Customize & Generate QR Codes in Seconds - Right in Figma!

plugins.name: The Settler — localiser for external (or missing) alias variables
plugins.description:
(Русский внизу 👇)

en:

This plugin localises all alias variables that refer to missing base variables (those located in external files or simply deleted)

🎦 Video demonstration: https://youtu.be/f9Ofv7lB-Lk


Why is this a problem?! Figma doesn't care about these links, it doesn't transfer them to the new file, but leaves the links to the companion variables (base/master variables) in the old file. And this isn't what you expect when you copy variables :)


In simple words, what the plugin does:

  1. It looks for alias variables that have a reference to base variables that didn't make it to this file (either left in another file or simply missing)
  2. Creates copies of such variables in this file
  3. Rebinds the alias variable, changing the reference from the external master variable (base variable) to the newly created local one


Works for variables of all types:

  1. color,
  2. text,
  3. boolean,
  4. numeric

It should work with multiple mods, but I haven't tested this part.


ru:

Плагин поможет, когда вы взяли и "тупа" скопировали переменные из другого файла, а там были алиасы (переменные ссылались на другие переменные).

🎦 Видео-демонстрация: https://youtu.be/f9Ofv7lB-Lk

Но вот незадача! Figma не заботиться об этих связях, она не переносит их в новый файл, а оставляет ссылки на переменные-спутники (базовые/мастер-переменные) в старом файле. А это вообще не то, чего ждёшь, когда копируешь переменные :)


Простыми словами, что делает плагин:

  1. Ищет переменные-алиасы, которые ссылаются на базовые переменные, не дошедшие до этого файла (либо оставшиеся в другом файле, либо пропавшие без вести)
  2. Создает копии таких переменных в этом файле
  3. Перевязывает алиас-переменную, меняя ссылку с внешней мастер-переменной (базовой переменной) на локальную


Работает для переменных всех типов:

  1. цветовые,
  2. текстовые,
  3. булевы,
  4. числовые


По идее, должно работает и с множественными модами, но я не тестил этот момент

accepted.name: Studio The
accepted.description:
The UX/UI designer,
The Motion designer

Turn your designs into live websites directly from Figma!

With Publish Ninja, you can instantly turn your Figma designs into fully functional, responsive websites directly from Figma.


🎉 Try it free! - We offer a 7-day free trial so you can experience publishing directly from Figma.


Why use Publish Ninja?

You’ve designed a website in Figma, but now you’re stuck. Either you need a developer, or you have to wrestle with complicated website builders. It’s frustrating, time-consuming, and slows you down.


Publish Ninja lets you publish fully responsive websites directly from Figma—no coding needed. With just a few clicks, your design goes live as a website.


⚡ How it Works

  1. Design in Figma – Create your site just like any other Figma project.
  2. Customize responsiveness – Easily adjust layouts for mobile, tablet, and desktop.
  3. Publish instantly – One click, and your website is live!

✅ No-Code website builder – No technical skills required.

✅ Live in seconds – Skip the hassle of exporting and coding.

plugins.name: Frame Duplicator
plugins.description:
Frame Duplicator is a plugin designed to help designers and social media managers quickly create multiple posts based on CSV data and images. Perfect for batch processing posts for social media, marketing, or any other repetitive content creation tasks.


In a sentence: Choose images and upload a CSV file listing the images and any text you’d like displayed. This plugin will read your CSV, duplicate a selected frame, and insert the specified images as the background along with the provided text in designated areas.


Key Features:

CSV Integration: Automatically populate frames with text fields such as titles and subtitles based on CSV data, making it easy to maintain consistent content across multiple designs.

Image Replacement: Efficiently replace images in frames based on file names specified in the CSV, allowing you to work seamlessly with visual content.

Aspect Ratio Preservation: Ensures that images maintain their aspect ratio when resized within frames, avoiding distortion or stretching.

Batch Frame Duplication: Create multiple frames with the click of a button, with each frame populated by unique data and images from your CSV.


How to Use:

Prepare CSV and Images: Make sure your CSV file includes columns for text fields (title and subtitle) and image filenames.


Your CSV column titles must be:

title, subtitle, imageName.


Select a Frame in Figma: Choose the frame you want to duplicate.


Your Frame must include text / rectangle elements titled:

##Title ##Image ##Subtitle


Upload CSV and Images: Load your CSV and corresponding image files through the plugin’s interface.

Create Frames: Click "Create Frames" to generate frames based on the CSV data, with each frame containing unique text and images row by row.
plugins.tagline: Duplicate frames with text and images based on CSV data for streamlined post creation

plugins.name: MultiDesign Assistant
plugins.description:
MultiDesign Assistant 是一款多功能設計輔助工具，能提升 Figma 的工作效率。這個插件提供了四個實用功能：


一鍵交換填充和描邊顏色：快速切換物件的填充和描邊顏色，節省設計時間。

快速調整尺寸：輸入具體數值，一鍵調整物件的長度和寬度。

等比縮小：通過輸入自定義比例或選擇預設值，輕鬆實現物件的等比例縮小。

圓形文字標籤：為選中的文字自動添加圓形背景，完美適用於創建數字標籤等設計元素。



MultiDesign Assistant is a versatile design tool aimed at enhancing productivity for Figma users. This plugin offers four practical features:


One-click Fill and Stroke Swap: Quickly exchange the fill and stroke colors of objects, saving design time.


Quick Size Adjustment: Input specific values to instantly adjust the length and width of objects.


Proportional Scaling: Easily scale objects proportionally by entering custom ratios or selecting from preset values.


Circular Text Labels: Automatically add circular backgrounds to selected text, perfect for creating number tags and similar design elements.
plugins.tagline: Swap colors, adjust sizes, scale proportionally, add circular text backgrounds.

plugins.name: Nalipka
plugins.description:
Nalipka is a simple and playful plugin designed to quickly turn any element into a sticker.

Perfect for brainstorms, workshops, notes, visual highlights — or just for fun.


How it works:


  1. Select one or more elements
  2. Open the Nalipka plugin
  3. Click the Create Sticker button
  4. The selected elements will:
  5. Get a white stroke
  6. Soft shadow
  7. 2px rounded corners
  8. Text will be auto-flattened to vector


Key features:


✦ Supports multiple selected objects


✦ Automatically converts text to vector


✦ Preserves original position


✦ Adds white stroke, shadow, and rounded corners — like a real sticker


✦ Clean and minimal UI
plugins.tagline: Make anything look like a sticker. Select → Click → Done.

plugins.name: FigJam Export to Markdown or JSON
plugins.description:
Turn sticky-note chaos into structured documentation.


This plugin reads your FigJam board, detects heading hierarchies by the number of ⭐ star stamps on each card, and exports a clean outline – perfect for journey-maps, service blueprints, research affinity walls or any workshop board that needs to become a report.


What you get

• Markdown or JSON with true heading levels (H1 / H2 / …).

• Bullet lists for every sticky-note or text card.

• Embedded screenshots and photos – automatically resized, placed under the right heading and zipped into an assets/ folder.

• One-click download; whole page or just the frames you select.


How it works

1 Structure top-down

Place headings above their content; the heading’s width defines the column below it.

2 Stamp to mark hierarchy

3 identical stars = H1, 2 stars = H2, 1 or 0 = regular content.

(Stars sitting on an image are ignored.)

3 Click “Download MD” or “Download JSON”

Text-only boards produce a single file; boards with images are delivered as a ready-to-share .zip.


Stop rebuilding journey maps slide-by-slide. Export once, drop the Markdown into Notion, Confluence or GitHub – or feed the JSON into your own reporting pipeline.
plugins.tagline: From FigJam to finished journey-map reports in one click – stamp, export, done.

plugins.name: Voice to Text for Figma
plugins.description:
Easily insert text into Figma using your voice!

Click “Open Voice Tool” → Start speaking in the browser → Your speech will be transcribed and automagically added into your selected Figma text layer.

No typing. Just talking.


✅ Use Case 1:

“Tired of switching between docs and Figma just to copy-paste written content?”

Speak directly into the plugin’s voice tool and instantly push the transcription into your selected text box—no tab switching, no distractions.


✅ Use Case 2:

“Want to insert longer text into your Figma design without typing it all out?”

Use Voice to Text for Figma to dictate your content and have it transcribed directly into your design—perfect for mockups, user flows, or note-taking during brainstorming.


Supported Features & Limits:

✅ Languages Supported: English, Arabic, Chinese (Simplified), Dutch, French, German, Hindi, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish

🕐 Time Limit: Records up to 60 seconds per session, auto-warns you before timeout

🌐 Browser Compatibility:

✅ Supported: Google Chrome, Safari, Opera, Samsung Internet

⚠️ Partially Supported: Microsoft Edge, Firefox

❌ Not Supported: Internet Explorer, Brave, Arc

🧠 Auto-restart: On silence to ensure smoother capture

🎙 Microphone Permission : Detects and guidance for Mac & Windows users.

🖥️ Figma Compatibility: Works seamlessly on both Figma Browser and Figma Desktop / Mac App

✅ Accessibility Enhancements

❤️ Open Source Code: https://github.com/mryeshwanth/voice-figma-plugin


How it works:

  1. When you click Open Voice Tool, a new browser window will open to start recording.
  2. This is required because Figma Mac/Desktop plugins can’t access your microphone directly.
  3. The tool uses your browser's built-in Web Speech API (SpeechRecognition) to transcribe your voice locally — nothing is sent to any external server.
  4. Once done, the transcription is securely sent back to the Figma plugin and inserted into your selected text node.
plugins.tagline: Convert your voice to text, directly into Figma.

plugins.name: Orange Tokens: Primitive Variables Generator
plugins.description:
Description

Orange Tokens helps you turn any base color into a full set of tints and shades — instantly and intelligently. Whether you’re starting a new design system or refining an existing one, this plugin makes it easy to generate consistent, customizable color variables in Figma.


No more manual tweaks or guesswork — Orange Tokens helps you scale your colors the smart way.


🚀 How to use

  1. Enter your base colors and give them names
  2. Press “Generate Variables”
  3. Orange Tokens generates variables with tints, shades, and smart naming
  4. Use the generated palette directly as design tokens, or tweak and reuse them across your system.


✨ Features

  1. One-click color palette generation
  2. Auto-generated tints & shades from base colors
  3. Design token–friendly naming system
  4. Organized Figma variables by base name
  5. Great for light/dark mode, theming, and token systems
  6. Fast, clean, and easy to use — even at scale


⚙️ How it works

Orange Tokens applies a structured algorithm to your base hex values, producing harmonious tints and shades. Each palette is mapped to a name you provide (like green, orange, blue) and creates a set of Figma variables grouped logically — perfect for scaling your system with consistency.


Everything happens in a few clicks, without breaking your existing styles or variables.


💬 Feedback and feature ideas?

This is just the beginning — future updates will explore typography tokens, spacing, mode support, and more. Have an idea or request? Email me at inamdar.chinmay25@gmail.com, or leave a comment on the plugin page!
plugins.tagline: Generate color palette & token generator for your design system

136117.release_notes:
✨ What’s New

React + Tailwind Migration
The plugin has been fully refactored using React and Tailwind CSS — enabling better scalability, maintainability, and UI consistency that aligns with modern design systems.

Customizable Swatch Defaults
You can now define the base color within a swatch (from 50–950), giving you control over which variant serves as the default.

plugins.name: Figma to Azure
plugins.description:
Crete Azure work items without leaving Figma.


Key Features

  1. One-Click Creation: Select any Figma component to generate an Azure Board item.
  2. Automatic Previews: Visuals attach directly to the work item.
  3. Direct Linking: Clickable links between Azure work items and components.
  4. Custom Field Mapping: Match your Azure setup with flexible field configs.
  5. Team Area Support: Organize work in your project’s structure.
  6. Smart Field Detection: Autofills required Azure fields.


Why Teams Use It

  1. Save time—no more screenshots or copy-paste.
  2. Developers get full visual context.
  3. Sync design and dev workflows effortlessly.
  4. Keep everything traceable and connected.


How to Get Started

  1. Select a Figma component
  2. Add your Azure Personal Access Token (requires Read & Write access for work items)
  3. Enter your Azure DevOps URL
  4. Customize the item
  5. Click Create


That’s it—the plugin handles previews, links, and field setup for you.

plugins.name: Naming Helper
plugins.description:
# Naming Helper - 피그마 플러그인


선택된 프레임(들) 내의 모든 요소 이름을 한 번에 변경할 수 있는 피그마 플러그인입니다.


## 기능


- 선택된 프레임 내의 모든 하위 요소 이름을 일괄 변경

- 여러 프레임을 동시에 선택하여 일괄 처리 가능

- 현재 선택된 프레임 개수 표시

- 프레임이 선택되지 않았을 경우 알림 제공


## 사용 방법


1. 이름을 변경하고자 하는 프레임(들)을 선택합니다.

2. 플러그인을 실행합니다.

3. 입력 필드에 새로운 이름을 입력합니다.

4. "이름 변경하기" 버튼을 클릭합니다.

5. 프레임 내의 모든 요소 이름이 변경됩니다.
plugins.tagline: Naming Helper

plugins.name: Layer Formatter
plugins.description:
Streamline your design-to-development workflow with Layer Formatter, a powerful tool that simplifies layer renaming. Whether you need hyphens, underscores, camel case, or kebab case, this tool ensures your layers align perfectly with coding conventions.


Say goodbye to messy names and hello to clean, developer-friendly files. Perfect for effortless handoff and collaboration!


✨ Key Features ✨


  1. Auto-Space Conversion: Automatically replace spaces in layer names with underscores (_) or remove them entirely for clean, code-friendly naming.
  2. Batch Rename Layers: Rename multiple layers in seconds, saving time and improving efficiency.
  3. Flexible Naming Styles: Supports hyphens, underscores, camel case, kebab case, and more to fit your coding standards.
  4. Instant Updates: Apply changes with a single click—no need for tedious manual edits.
  5. Streamlined Handoff: Deliver developer-ready files with consistent, clean layer names for seamless collaboration.
